name: Archio XML Model to Gemma OAS

mapping.name: name.#text
mapping.version: {% set xmlns = '@attributes.xmlns' %}{% if xmlns is not empty %}{{ xmlns|trim('/')|split('/')|last }}{% else %}0.0{% endif %}
mapping.properties: {% if properties.property|default %}{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio XML Model Property to Gemma OAS.json", properties.property, true)|json_encode }}{%else%}[]{%endif%}
mapping.elements: {% if elements|default %}{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio XML Elements to Gemma OAS.json", elements, true)|json_encode }}{%else%}[]{%endif%}
mapping.relationships: {% if relationships|default %}{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio XML Relations to Gemma OAS.json", relationships, true)|json_encode }}{%else%}[]{%endif%}
mapping.organizations: {% if organizations|default %}{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio XML Organization to Gemma OAS.json", organizations, true)|json_encode }}{%else%}[]{%endif%}
mapping.propertyDefinitions: {% if organizations|default %}{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio XML Property Definition to Gemma OAS.json", organizations, true)|json_encode }}{%else%}[]{%endif%}
mapping.views: {% if views.diagrams.view|default %}{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio XML Views to Gemma OAS.json", views.diagrams.view, true)|json_encode }}{%else%}[]{%endif%}
